sentences.sentence: The value of America and Dutch increase greatly between 2010 and 2012; while Japan and China decrease between 2010 and 2012.
China has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011 and 2012.

sentences.sentence: The value of America and Dutch increase greatly between 2010 and 2012; while Japan and China decrease between 2010 and 2012.
China has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011 and 2012.
